Class LoadPushDown.RequiredField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.LoadPushDown.RequiredField

    LoadPushDown

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public static class LoadPushDown.RequiredField
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Describes a field that is required to execute a scripts.
